parameters.name: DataTime
parameters.description: The data timestamp of the job. Specify a string in the HH:mm:ss format.

parameters.name: EndDate
parameters.description: The time when the job stops running. Specify a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The application group ID. You can obtain the application group ID on the Application Management page in the SchedulerX console.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The namespace ID. You can obtain the namespace ID on the Namespace page in the SchedulerX console.

parameters.name: NamespaceSource
parameters.description: The source of the namespace. This parameter is required only for a special third party.

parameters.name: StartDate
parameters.description: The time when the job starts to rerun. Specify a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.
